class_description: The NSExtensionRequestHandling protocol provides a life cycle hook into an app extension. An extension’s principal object can implement this protocol and use beginRequest(with:) to keep track of the request from a host app.

params.param_description: An NSExtensionContext object that represents the context in which the host app makes the request. Typically, the context contains data that the extension can work on.

Methods.method_description: Tells the extension to prepare for a host app’s request.Required.
